creditline: Gift of Elissa and Paul Cahn
description: brown, tan, red, cream and medium and light blue; central rondel with rhomboid patterns in radiating diamonds and border with pairs of S shaped scrolls; stripes on short sides; border with intertwined Vs; zigzag pattern overall in brown, cream, tan and blue
markings: at one corner, on tag: 10 (crossed out) 3.7 x 6.7 / M702-1900 / Mexican / Saltia
title: Serape
